channel.title: Donator cape doesn't show
channel.description: All right, I added the model ID and everything, and it works on the desktop client. I do it for the webclient and when I log in, it shows the correct model for half a second, then goes into a dwarf head. Wtf. How can I fix this?

item.title: Donator cape doesn't show
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

All right, I added the model ID and everything, and it works on the desktop client.
I do it for the webclient and when I log in, it shows the correct model for half a second, then goes into a dwarf head. Wtf. How can I fix this?

Read full topic
